welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gahanna, the charming heart of the Midwest! Known for its beautiful parks, quaint downtown area, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves Delta and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Port Columbus International Airport serves American, Southwest, and United airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Port Columbus International Airport serves Allegiant, Frontier, and Spirit airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'CMH Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves all commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport handles all cargo operations and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
